name: Banana Extraction (Miles Carr)
description:
🍌 Banana Extraction 🍌

🍌 Do you have what it takes to shoot red dudes, and collect the holy grail? 🍌

This game was developed for the  Moon Rift Game Jam!

In this game, your health is based off time, so use it wisely! You must go through the levels, dodging bullets and enemy attacks to avoid losing more time! You can collect more time along the way by destroying turrets, killing red dudes or collecting time pickups scattered around each level!

Did you know, this game was created in UE4? The most top notch, non buggy software to ever be created? We totally did not lose 2 days of work whilst working on this game jam, like, that would be an insane accusation towards UE4, the greatest development tool! Did I also mention that it's a non buggy software?

🍌The top banana lovers who helped make this game possible!🍌

🍌 Miles Carr - Programming and Level Design

🍌Filip Krawczyk - 3D modelling and Level Design

🍌Patrycja Krawczyk - QA Tester

🍌Music in Game: "Kane West Is Playing In My House" - Macross 82-99

🍌Controls🍌

🍌P - Pause Game

🍌V - Use Knife

🍌WASD - Move

🍌SHIFT - Sprint

🍌CONTROL - Crouch

🍌LMB - Shoot Bananas
